edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame

Class BattleshipWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window
      • edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame.BattleshipWindow

  • public class BattleshipWindow
extends com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window
    This class extends the Window compoenent of the Lanterna library to render the Battleship Game on the client side. It is instantiated by BattleshipDisplay to render the game.
    Version:
    1.0, April 2014
    Author:
    Twitch Plays Battleship Group

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Interactable focusedBox
      Keep track of the currently focused box, for use in event callback.
      com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Panel shipLabelPanel
      Panel to group together shipLabels.
      com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Label[] shipLabels
      Simple text labels that display which ships are still on the board.
      com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Table table
      Table containing ship position buttons.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BattleshipWindow(UpdateableClient client)
      Creates the window for the Battleship game, including a lanterna Table that represents the board, navigable buttons to fill the grid, and labels that display which ships remain.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onKeyPressed(com.googlecode.lanterna.input.Key key)
      This method overrides the lanterna window onKeyPressed method, because the library does not support navigating left or right on the grid.
      void sendInput(int row, int column)
      Wrapper for client's sendInput function.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BattleshipWindow

        public BattleshipWindow(UpdateableClient client)
        Creates the window for the Battleship game, including a lanterna Table that represents the board, navigable buttons to fill the grid, and labels that display which ships remain. Event handling is located in BattleshipWindowAdapter.
        Parameters:
        client - An updateable game client, used in the sendInput method to create a command and send input to server on key press.

    • Method Detail

      • sendInput

        public void sendInput(int row,
             int column)
        Wrapper for client's sendInput function. This allows the BattleshipWindowAdapter to pass input to the client.

      • onKeyPressed

        public void onKeyPressed(com.googlecode.lanterna.input.Key key)
        This method overrides the lanterna window onKeyPressed method, because the library does not support navigating left or right on the grid.
        Overrides:
        onKeyPressed in class com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window
